Class Vehicule

  • java.lang.Object
    • vehicules.Vehicule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dessinable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VehicElect

    public class Vehicule
extends java.lang.Object
implements Dessinable
    Author:
    Michael Oliveira-Silva Classe possédant les informations sur un véhicule.
